originalText.text: When we first moved into our office in Manhattan, carpet cleaning was the first service we needed. After asking around we called Mint Commercial Cleaning. They did a great job getting the old commercial carpet looking like new again so we could feel comfortable when clients arrived. We have since recommended them to others.

text.text: When we first moved into our office in Manhattan, carpet cleaning was the first service we needed. After asking around we called Mint Commercial Cleaning. They did a great job getting the old commercial carpet looking like new again so we could feel comfortable when clients arrived. We have since recommended them to others.

originalText.text: I am very pleased with the job performed by Mint Commercial Cleaning. They arrive after hours, clean all the carpets including getting out any spots. When we arrive at work the next day the offices smell like fresh air. I would have to say that Mint Commercial Cleaning is the best carpet cleaning service we have ever had.

originalText.text: As the manager of a large apartment complex in New York carpet cleaning is a service I need frequently. I rely on Mint Commercial Cleaning exclusively. They have saved me from replacing carpets many times by their thorough deep cleaning service. After tenants move in I never get complaints like I did with the old service.

originalText.text: Before we could move into our offices, carpet cleaning was required. We asked several neighbors and they all recommended Mint Commercial Cleaning. We took their advice and we are glad we did. No need to replace that carpet. It looks like new after a thorough cleaning by these professionals.

originalText.text: Mint Commercial Cleaning cleans the carpeting in our florist shop in New York. We have a lot of foot traffic from the street and they keep our carpeting looking like new at all times. We would recommend these carpet cleaners to any business without reservation.
